display_name: [Ceaseless Combat] Super Saiyan God SS Goku (Kaioken)

kit.leader_skill: "Representatives of Universe 7" or "Full Power" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Tournament Participants" or "Super Heroes" Category

super_attack.name: Kaioken God Kamehameha
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; while sacrificing 5% HP

passive_skill.name: Intensified with the Kaioken Technique!
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there are another 2 or more "Tournament Participants" Category allies or another "Representatives of Universe 7" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Guards all attacks, DEF 170% up and launches an additional Super Attack for 3 turns; (Once) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded) to TEQ Ki Spheres; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 200% up; DEF 100% up when HP is 70% or more; ATK 100% up when HP is 70% or less; 1 or more TEQ Ki Spheres obtained: ATK 100% up; Launches an additional Super Attack; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Representatives of Universe 7" Category characters: ATK 70% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 30% up; After the character's or an ally's Revival Skill is activated: (Forever) Guards all attacks; (Forever) DEF 170% up; (Forever) Launches an additional Super Attack; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up
